title: "Researchers combine deep learning and physics to fix motion-corrupted MRI scans"
excerpt: "Compared to other imaging modalities like X-rays or CT scans, MRI scans provide high-quality soft tissue contrast. Unfortunately, MRI is highly sensitive to motion, with even the smallest of movements resulting in image artifacts."
